attributes.action: Ban biofuel as it will cause wide spread food shortage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Growing crops used for biofuel will cause wide spread food shortage. Land normally used for growing edible crops will be used for growing crops that will provide oil for biofuel. This will have a horrific impact on the world food supply.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
